website_summaries.verdict: In line with Merrell footwear tradition, the Jungle Moc is an ultra-comfortable lifestyle shoe that features trail-ready elements making it a versatile pair that functions well on both urban and rugged terrains.  This shoe boasts durability, excellent arch support, versatility, and convenience. Not to be outdone is its minimal aesthetic that exudes a mature vibe, perfect for on-the-go individuals who want to look put together in an instant
pros: The Merrell Jungle Moc is available in a number of neutral colorways
A large number of reviewers described this sneaker as very comfortable and ideal for all-day wear
Its design and colors are versatile, which several shoe users appreciate
The shoe runs true to size
Some purchasers commended the pair's well-built construction and high-quality materials
It is very durable and lasts a long time despite heavy usage, according to a number of wearers' opinions
Most consumers appreciate the convenience that the shoe's slip-on construction provides
This slip-on shoe breaks in nicely and hugs your foot comfortably, based on a couple of commenters' observations
The suede leather upper keeps feet warm attested some wearers
A number of consumers applauded its stylish aesthetic
A couple of reviewers said that they hiked in this pair and it didn't disappoint
The pair is worth every penny, according to many buyers
cons: Some wearers wished that the shoe had more ventilation
A few wanted more color options for this shoe

customer_reviews.title: lightweight, but supportive and durable
customer_reviews.text: I've had these before, they're not cheap, but they are very comfortable. They're light, supportive and don't lose their shape over time. I spray the suede with a protectant, but the shoes themselves are fairly waterproof and they've stood up to years of rockhopping up and down the local shoreline several times a day. I'm happy to wear them out and about in bad weather, and they're stable on slippy ground, though for really rough terrain you might want something that also supports the ankels.
customer_reviews.author: Miss KF Preedy

customer_reviews.title: They've changed the fit!
customer_reviews.text: This was my 3rd pair of these shoes and I don't know what has changed but the fit is very tight and very uncomfortable and also painful after a short time. I got these shoes in October '19, it is now January 2020 and although I haven't worn them much (too uncomfortable) they show no sign of stretching a little. I didn't return them as I thought they would "give" slightly as my others have done but I am going to have to give up on them although they were not inexpensive. Not happy!!
customer_reviews.author: christine lawson

customer_reviews.title: Jungle Mocs - great for comfort, durability and ease
customer_reviews.text: I love Jungle Mocs. This is my second pair now. Ideal for dog walking, the walk to school .... any time you want to walk in comfort and you want to be out of the door fast. Had a sore back recently and ideal as they just slip on without needing to bend down. The last pair are still in use and the sole and upper are still in really good condition despite lots of wet muddy dog walks. Ordered a pair in midnight to have a cleaner pair for the walk to school as I was wearing "embarrassingly dirty shoes all the time" apparently.
customer_reviews.author: SLMHP

customer_reviews.title: These haven't worn out and are sooooo comfortable and look so much smarter than the usual black ...
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit hesitant at spending so much on a pair of shoes that are not exactly glamorous - I use them for school because as a Performance teacher I am constantly on my feet. These haven't worn out and are sooooo comfortable and look so much smarter than the usual black trainers I have worn. I had a similar cheaper style to these and they just don't match up to the quality and robustness of the merrells. I have had them six months now and wear them for eight hours per day and there is not a wear or tear on the sole or upper areas of them.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Merrells and Perfect Price
customer_reviews.text: With the weather dry now it's brilliant to think they will stay clean and new looking longer!!! Though as usual I have sprayed suede protector on now!! I have get several pairs of these over the years, they last VERY well and at a much better from here too!! FEW!!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've had these type before and just love them, hence when my old one (15yrs old) started to lose the profile I wanted them again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: smart casual walking/strolling shoes
customer_reviews.text: Arived fast and came with instructions regarding treatment needed...eg: waterproofing ....very smart for casual shoes I'll be walking my dog in...at least 3 miles a day...until weather changes and propper hiking boots needed to be worn. Easy to clean off and good waterproof cover in our shocking wet Devon spring....My brothers have lasted over a year.....makes me wonder why I haven't got them before...price I guess.......though if mine last that long they'll be a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Angel

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievably comfortable. Very well constructed and unlike similar 'clone' products this shoe retains its tight fit and doesn't go floppy with wear. I have worn them for years without them falling apart, and even put them through the washing machine when they get really grubby. Sadly washing (even by hand) does lose the furry sueded surface on the outside, but you can't really see that unless you're very close.
customer_reviews.author: Rameses

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't normally buy shoes online but if you know your size in Merrell then it's a safe bet. The size is as expected and similar to other shoes I have. This is the second pair of these I have had and no doubt I will get another when I have worn them to death. I like the fact that they keep your feet warm in winter. I don't like the fact that the soles are not particularly good on icy pavements.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Great quality shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Sturdy and very comfortable right from the start of wearing them. A bit slippery on smooth wet floors so you just need to be a bit careful about that. I'm usually size 7 but sometimes 6.5 in Clarks shoes so I just took a chance on the smaller side and they fit perfectly. So easy to get on and off which was my reason for buying them. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are amazingly comfortable and fit as expected. The only downside is that they are not as non-slip as I would have liked and I have to tread carefully in wet conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Speal

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic tough and comfortable loafers
customer_reviews.text: I can't get enough of these shoes: they are so comfortable, and unlike cheap clones they do not go floppy with wear, fitting as snugly on day 500 as they did when I first put them on. I've thrown them in the washing machine too when they got too grubby. I just wish we could get more of the styles and colours in the UK that are available in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Rameses

customer_reviews.title: merrell women jungle moc classic taupe size 7
customer_reviews.text: merrell women jungle moc classic taupe size 7 I was intially worried about buying these because I thought 'how can these be comfortable and it's not made of leather?', but how wrong I was, there the best shoes I've bought, they are so comfortable and being disabled they help me stand with more control and when I do occasionally fall, they help my feet have a firmer grip on the floor to stand up again.
customer_reviews.author: trish

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are absolutely great. I have problems with arthritis in my big toe which is painful when I walk and these shoes help massively. I bought Merrell walking shoes which help but didn't look great for going to work so when I found these I was very happy. I wold definitely recommend these shoes to anyone problem feet or not.
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect. They are not glamorous or pretty but very functional and comfortable. Having had a back operation I can not bend to put shoes on, so these are fantastic as I can slip them on and I don't have to ask anyone to help me put my shoes on!! However, I know once my back is healed and I am back to full mobility I will still love these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Angela J Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: If you've never tried Merrell shoes then it's time you did. Last season's models are often reduced and are excellent value. Both my wife and I select Merrell's because they're comfortable, fashionable, hard wearing and very supportive. These shoes are no exception. Excellent. Oh yes, and be prepared for them to seemingly last forever. We replace ours because we're 'tired' of them rather than because they need replacing.
customer_reviews.author: Solario

customer_reviews.title: Comfy shoes
customer_reviews.text: Look nice and hubby says they’re pretty comfy too, good fit, reasonably priced
customer_reviews.author: MEG

customer_reviews.title: A realy good comfortable casual shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have bought the same shoe again and again, lasts ages, good structure, relaxed comfort, not great at gripping wet pavement, but bearable, when they wear out (eventually) I would consider buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Casual comfort but sizing very slightly generous!!
customer_reviews.text: Superb casual shoes well made and comfortable but unfortunately a little large and a tendency to slip on the heel - this was a surprise as Merrell trekking and hiking shoes where true to size. I couldn't take the risk and had to return but I feel these loafers are worthy of wardrobe space!
customer_reviews.author: sj

customer_reviews.title: like nothing else I'd tried before
customer_reviews.text: These Merralls are so comfy, like nothing else I'd tried before. So good I had get another pair. I have wide feet, AA fit, and these fit like a glove, first time I put these and the other pair on though, they feel like such a close fit that makes you wonder if their right, however after walking round the house with them on for a bit, I soon realised the're a great fit for my feet. Support is in all the right places, there perfect. The other thing I love about these is that I can take them on and off without the need to bend to my feet, perfect if you have back issues :-)
customer_reviews.author: miss ge clark

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: My wife finds these shoes really comfortable, even worn all day walking into town with our granddaughter about 3 mile round trip , buy half or full size bigger , if your normal size is a exact or tight fit, I would buy size bigger .
customer_reviews.author: nicholas pemberton

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: These are "moderately large" in regard to the tightness of the shoe. The length is perfect. I do have slim, narrow feet so it is more my fault rather than the sizing. I've solved the problem with an extra inner sole. The shoes are easy to put on/take off, give good arch support and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was intially worried about buying these because I thought 'how can these be comfortable and it's not made of leather?', but how wrong I was, there the best shoes I've bought, they are so comfortable and being disabled they help me stand with more control and when I do occasionally fall, they help my feet have a firmer grip on the floor to stand up again.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. J. M. Dixson

customer_reviews.title: I love them
customer_reviews.text: So so comfortable. My husband has several pairs of these and has always said how comfortable they are. I wasn't sure that I needed any though, but when he ordered more I got a pair for myself. They are fantastic. Why did I wait so long! They fit like a glove and.... I can't say enough good about them!
customer_reviews.author: AlisonM

customer_reviews.title: ... size 42 really snug warm light on your feet delighted with these shoes
customer_reviews.text: These arrived a day early they fit perfectly size 42 really snug warm light on your feet delighted with these shoes .i stand all day in work and find these the most comfortable shoes Ive wore for 20 years in the job well worth the money great great grea!!!
customer_reviews.author: Terri M.

customer_reviews.title: great comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Have ordered and sent back countless pairs of shoes. Have been looking for a pair for work., have wide feet and work 12 hour shifts. Finally found a pair that fit the bill. Wore on night shift and feet not aching at all, plus feet not too warm either. Very very comfortable would recommend. There are not flat and do give you a bit of height but I think this improves posture.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Eccles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect every-day shoes
customer_reviews.text: These replaced my last pair, worn to a nubbin over three years. Literally worn every day, perfect "mum's shoes" for running around doing errands, school run, dog walk, grocery shop, football practice pitch side, in all weather: hot, cold, wet, whatever.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Boone

customer_reviews.title: Fitting & Use
customer_reviews.text: Top score shoe, cant stop wearing it, it for every occasion & weather in & out for me as a recovering stroke patient easy too slip into & very comfortable for my health & safety re falls its non slip & also non marking on floors
customer_reviews.author: Ebony

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pair I've bought - I keep buying this shoe because it's the most comfortable, practical and nice-looking shoe ever. I wear them all year long. They're great for long walks, my feet never hurt. The sole is great, which is a big issue for me since I have lower back problems and need a shoe that absorbs the shock. Best shoe ever, I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: most comfortable shoes I've ever own
customer_reviews.text: I want to say a big thank you to Merrell for having developed such a blessed product. I just did a marathon walk and had been worried about developing blisters. These shoes are incredible. I had absolutely no blisters at all, even the usual sore points feel completely at ease. I am so pleased and would certainly recommend to friends. Always liked Merrell walking shoes and this one is equally impressive. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. The best shoes I ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair from the same model. I have brown and cream colour as well. Very comfortable. The best shoes I ever had!
customer_reviews.author: Scorpio

customer_reviews.title: present
customer_reviews.text: The shoes look great,but as it is a Christmas present i can'not comment how they feel,as have not wear them yet, but service from Merrel is excellent and really fast, about shoes i will be able to comment after Christmas when i have chance to wear them
customer_reviews.author: agatha day

customer_reviews.title: Such Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Having had similar Merrell shoes before, I ordered these with confidence and was not disappointed. The previous pair I had for many years and wore them as slippers. These I purchased for slippers also. They are extremely comfortable and hard wearing. They may seem expensive for slippers, however, the length of time they last, they work out many, many times cheaper than conventional slippers!!
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Fab.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had several pairs of these and use them firvwslking thebdigs as they go on quickly. I buy the men’s 7 as I have a wide fit. Worth every penny and they last for ages.
customer_reviews.author: mrs suzanne teed

customer_reviews.title: ... worn the Jungle Moc shoes as they are so comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Always worn the Jungle Moc shoes as they are so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are the comfiest shoes I have ever worn. Hubby bought a pair last year and told me they were comfy,don't know why I waited so long to buy my own. They are certainly going to be my staple casual
customer_reviews.author: knitty

customer_reviews.title: Comfy.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly/on time. They are really comfy, just what I wanted. I've only had them a week. So may add more later, regarding how well they last etc. They are slippery on smooth wet pavements, so take care in the wet.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: nice product but too big
customer_reviews.text: Lovely shoes but size 6 was far too big and had to return them. However, I will buy the smaller size as they seem quite comfortable though despite not being my actual size.
customer_reviews.author: EV

customer_reviews.title: these are really comfortable. Fit perfectly and even on the hot days ...
customer_reviews.text: I finally spent a little extra on shoes for work, these are really comfortable. Fit perfectly and even on the hot days they don't cause your feet to overheat and protect them in the cold. Very highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: maria j

customer_reviews.title: comfort and support
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the ultimate in comfort and support. When you move around wearing them you feel that your feet are being fully protected, cushioned and supported. An excellent product
customer_reviews.author: Mary Pearson

customer_reviews.title: They wear well!
customer_reviews.text: I have had these shoes for ages for walking my dogs and they are comfortable, hard wearing, waterproof. Everything you could want. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: IAnd

customer_reviews.title: There's a reason these are classics
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and supportive. I can walk all day in them without any discomfort. I was suprised that the fit was sloppy, though; I ordered my usual size and have to wear very thick socks with them. I haven't had this much give develop so quickly in the prior multiple pairs of these that I've owned. All the same, great shoe for the busy woman!
customer_reviews.author: Andream

customer_reviews.title: comfy
customer_reviews.text: Night these for my wife, whose had 3 pairs of these shoes previously. The most comfortable shoes she has.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as they used to be
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as older models, quality seems to have suffered over the years I have been buying this model of Merrels or so my wife says.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Live in shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd pair I have bought. Best dog walking shoes ever, comfy and so easy to get on and off, look good too, we'll worth price
customer_reviews.author: marosri

customer_reviews.title: Superb Merrell quality
customer_reviews.text: I searched everywhere to find this model which I believe that Merrell have now discontinued. I previously had a pair that lasted for years
customer_reviews.author: J. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: These were not for me but I've been only been ...
customer_reviews.text: These were not for me but I've been only been using Jungle Mocs for over 10 years now nothing else, they are so comfy you forget you've got them on at times
customer_reviews.author: W. Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Merrell Jungle Moc Classic Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These casual shoes are the most comfortable ones ever. Highly recommend them especially at the special price purchased. These will just last me for years, so pleased with them
customer_reviews.author: chow1982

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Got lower back pain and these shoes help me walk more confidently. Find myself reluctant to wear anything else, in fact.
customer_reviews.author: Elspeth Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best fitting casual shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic shoes, comfortable and long lasting, this is the second pair that I have purchased and will purchase again without hesitation
customer_reviews.author: sharef

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable. At work I'm standing pretty much all day, and they make a huge difference.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: "Simply the best"
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable shoes, light as air (even if they do look 'clumpy') My problem toes have never felt better! Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Best buy
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable well fitting shoes you can buy. I am on my fifth pair and have been wearing them over a long number of years. I would highly recommend these shoes. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Magz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I would guess that the commonly available Cotton Traders version is based on this - it looks very similar, but the Merrells always seem to have the edge on longevity, particularly the sole.
customer_reviews.author: Brimstone

customer_reviews.title: Bit big but comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfortable but a bit big for me...think they come up large so beware. Good non-slip soles and quite smart.
customer_reviews.author: FT

customer_reviews.title: These are womens shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are womens shoes and they have foot arch support. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Katharyn E Jones

customer_reviews.title: She loves them best shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my mum because after 10 years of CONSTANT wear her old Merrells where past it. She loves them best shoes ever!
customer_reviews.author: jules

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: These are just what I was looking for.They are suitable for both indoor and outdoor.I think that they will be very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Lazy Dazy

customer_reviews.title: Have bought for friends prior to buying for myself and they love them. Very comfortable and look good
customer_reviews.text: Tried on but not worn yet. Have bought for friends prior to buying for myself and they love them. Very comfortable and look good.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable casual shoes ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd pair I have had. It seems that I hardly ever take them off. Pricey but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: The Leo

customer_reviews.title: merrell womens jungle moc comfort shoe
customer_reviews.text: As usual with merrrell, this shoe fits really well & looks and feels good quality. I look forward to many comfortable days walking.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Anne Hardy

customer_reviews.title: sturdyj shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are very hard wearing shoes and will prove invaluable with all the wear and tear they're putting up with.,
customer_reviews.author: Carole Catchpole

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes but too large!
customer_reviews.text: Really comfy however they are more like a 5 than a 4 - too big for me unfortunately if they fitted I'd give 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Just arrived...
customer_reviews.text: ...and quick delivery service for free shipping! They looked so much neater in the box than I expected. Put them on and they fit like a glove. I'm a long but not wide fit, EU42 which is what I ordered. They don't look bulky and feel fantastic...Definitely a satisfied customer so far.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Very large
customer_reviews.text: The size seemed OK initally and then stretched so that now I have to wear two thick pairs of socks with them. I suggest going down a size.
customer_reviews.author: Moody Beauty

customer_reviews.title: Love Merrell Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great show. Extremely light and comfortable. Have a number of other Merrell shoes and normally allow an half size up for fitting.
customer_reviews.author: SteveM

customer_reviews.title: A newer ,smarter old friend
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of jungle mocs. I have had the others a few years & are the most comfortable this going. This seem to be exactly the same but a bit smarter, but I shall still use the others they seem to last & last.
customer_reviews.author: Pol

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really pleased with my purchase. These shoes are extremely comfortable and ideal for walking the dog. They are quite a generous fit but not a problem. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: chrisy

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. This is my 5th pair in 14 years!! Love them....
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Joan H Stewart

customer_reviews.title: I do like them
customer_reviews.text: I am struggling to find shoes to fit and these are good for walking the 2.5 miles to work that I walk if I wear bulky socks. It is just hard for a woman to find shoes to fit feet my size which appears to be changing as I get older.
customer_reviews.author: Magoo

customer_reviews.title: these shoes are extremely comfortable for my stupid wide old feet
customer_reviews.text: these shoes are extremely comfortable for my stupid wide old feet. they're not super grippy on metal manhole covers though!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Orange

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are very comfortable and surprisingly waterproof
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable and surprisingly waterproof. I crossed a stream on stones which lapped over the edge of the high built up soles. Very springy too and make for easy walking.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Katharine S Skillen

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable and supportive shoes particulary if you have a job that requires you to be on your feet during the day. Good for walking
customer_reviews.author: lillydog

customer_reviews.title: Spot on! Merrell does it again.
customer_reviews.text: Accurate on size, comfort, support & overall quality, Merrell never fails to deliver. Every pair of shoes I have is now Merrell. Keep on doing the good work!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. S. L. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever!
customer_reviews.text: Bought first pair in Edinburgh about 15 years ago in lovely dark brown. Been buying them ever since. Smart enough for work, go with anything jeans or trousers. Black is good, pity not in dark brown still.
customer_reviews.author: rkelly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are the best shoes on Earth! Pair number 4 I think!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: These run large so that's my only gripe. Otherwise, they are hardy and I think will last for years!
customer_reviews.author: Pori

customer_reviews.title: jungle moc
customer_reviews.text: these are great real comfy even with thick sox I have bad feet and find shoes difficult to fit but these are great and good price from amazon
customer_reviews.author: mary inwood

customer_reviews.title: Winter walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Ordered wrong size originally but changed my order for a size 5. Really pleased with them
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: comfortable and practical, good fit. only one choice of colour though. would have preferred Tan.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Buxton

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: My second pair of Jungle Mocs and I love them. Extremely comfortable and hope that Merrell continue to produce them.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Douglas

customer_reviews.title: So nice!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to wear for short walks and have hardly worn anything since! Nice fit and so comfy, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AliHow

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. I did buy one size bigger than I usually wear though, as previous ones tried on were a bit tight. Very comfortable to wear. I've had several pairs.
customer_reviews.author: mrs m g bent

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful comfortable shoes but a bit large as available in .5 sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: thrilled with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought my first pair in 2002, still wearing them, very comfortable and good support for feet.Just a pity they are not available in South Africa.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Mocke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, warm. Great for winter time, shoes you can quickly put on and wear all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfortable walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a pair of slippers! Had previous pair for more than 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: Julie H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Delighted to find a pair of these in my size. Arrived promptly. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Read

customer_reviews.title: Merrell,s Jungle Moc Classic
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, good grip, nice to look at. Pretty well perfect for casual and to wear in town and on a country walk
customer_reviews.author: Mrs N P Hardiker

customer_reviews.title: Ultra Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I first bought a pair of these shoes 11 years ago. Can wear them all day for warm comfy feet.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne Norris

customer_reviews.title: merrell jungle crocs
customer_reviews.text: these shoes arrived next day and are so comfortable and look great i wear them all the time highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: susan turner

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife as I have a pair and really love them and she loves them too.
customer_reviews.author: robert dunn

customer_reviews.title: sizing issues
customer_reviews.text: first time prime one day delivery has taken two days to get here i have admired these for a while before taking the plunge really liked the idea of a slip on as i confess to not always undoing my laces i ordered a 7 as thats my normal size plus i have other merrells in that size too big - reckoned a 6.5 would have been perfect but unfortunately not an available option not worth keeping as i'm sure they will stretch also not sure about the sole - didn't look to be grippy have returned and a pair of merrell siren sport with laces and a vibram sole ordered instead
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. H. L. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Comfy at first wearing.
customer_reviews.text: Lovely comfy shoes from first time on. I'd read other reviews that said they come up large so although my Merrell walking boots and sandals are size 6, I bought a 5 in these and they're perfect. If walked in rain and damp grass and feet stayed dry. I just wish Merrel would make these in a leather finish instead of suede, my partner has lovely brown leather ones, but Merrell only seem to make these for men.
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable walking shoes i've ever owned, i love them.The sizes are very generous, so i ordered a smaller size, so it may be advisable to order a size smaller than you normally take. They're also very sturdy & would last for years i'd imagine. I'm on my second pair at the moment, because i made the mistake putting them in the washing machine, big mistake! They shrunk to approximately a full size smaller. They have a faux suede finish so are best brushed with a suede brush.
customer_reviews.author: CarlyBC

customer_reviews.title: Lovely shoes, poor fit
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I had a pair years ago and wore them loads so decided to replace them at last. My feet have got larger, due to pregnancies, since I last purchased a pair so initially ordered 6.5. These were too small as my big toes touched the end. Next I ordered size 7. These were fine on the length but they slipped off really badly at the heel so sadly had to return both pairs. My feet are average width in Clarks but these seemed far too wide for me.
customer_reviews.author: R. Barton

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and practical.
customer_reviews.text: Comfort. That's what this is about. A proper heel, nice instep. I'm a lecturer, so most of every day is on my feet while I bore students about accountancy, for that these are perfect. They may look a bit like house slippers, but nobody has ever said anything.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Far too large. Ordered replacements at 38. 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: Far too large. Ordered replacements at 38.5. Box said they were 38.5 but label inside said 41.5! Smaller than last pair but still too large - could fit my husbands size 10 feet......
customer_reviews.author: Mrs C

product_meta.title: Merrell Women's Jungle Moc Slip-On Sneakers
product_meta.description: These Jungle Moc loafers from Merrell feature pig suede leather upper and moulded nylon arch shank. The Jungle Moc slip-on shoe is versatile enough to wear around the campsite or to the pub. Available in a variety of colours, the Jungle Moc will coordinate with both your adventure gear and your khakis. When you’re looking for a casual shoe with enough style for a trip into town, this is an ideal fit.
